detail_desc: Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Short A-line dress in a cotton weave with gathered tiers on the skirt. Square neckline front and back and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems. Unlined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a fleece-lined drawstring hood and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, flap front pockets with a press-stud and a side pocket on the outside, and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Long-sleeved jersey tops made from organic cotton.
Long-sleeved jersey top.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow sides and full coverage at the back.
Lace blouse with a small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves. Scalloped edge at the collar, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Lined, flounced bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastener at the back.

Calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a pleated bodice. Small frilled collar and an opening with a button at the front. Long. wide sleeves with narrow elastication and frills at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a large pompom on the top.
Soft, non-wired nursing bra in lace and cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined, opening cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads.
Dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sun hat in woven fabric with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Joggers in soft, patterned jersey with an elastication and a sewn-on bow at the waist, frill-trimmed fake front pockets and elasticated hems.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
V-neck T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Short cardigan knitted in a wool and alpaca blend for a soft, fluffy finish. V-neck, buttons down the front and long, voluminous sleeves that taper at the cuffs.
Round handbag in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles and a zip at the top, a narrow shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Width 6 cm, diameter 25 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Shorts in a patterned viscose weave with pleats at the top, side pockets and elastication at the back of the waist.
Cold shoulder top in soft printed jersey with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
3/4-length trousers in a crinkled cotton weave with an elasticated paper bag waist, decorative bow with glittery tassels, and wide, straight legs.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and detachable belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Boots in imitation leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, padding around the top of the shaft and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Jersey lining.
Fine-knit jumper in a modal and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fully lined bikini top with a wrapover front, short cap sleeves and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Short A-line skirt.
Long-sleeved top in block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in an airy linen weave with fringes on the short sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel.

High profile Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Linings in woven fabric made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Patterned soles. Heel 5 cm.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top, both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Playsuit in airy chiffon crêpe with a wrapover top and concealed press-stud at the front. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Jersey lining.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs have a gentle sculpting effect on the waist.

Popover jacket in a woven cotton blend with a drawstring hood, collar, zip at the front and concealed zip at one side. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, a kangaroo pocket and a concealed compartment with a zip. Lined.
Coat in soft, felted fabric containing some wool with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Boxy-style hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dungarees in cotton corduroy with adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, front and back pockets, a fake fly, and press-studs at the sides. Patterned lining at the top and hems.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Some of the polyester content of the joggers is recycled. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Imitation leather waist belt with a round buckle with plastic pearly beads. Width 2.5 cm.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and short slits in the sides.
Short skirt in jacquard-patterned, textured jersey with a concealed zip in one side.
Blouse in pattern-weave fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, long balloon sleeves and a yoke with gathers front and back. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and reversible sequin panels down the sides of the legs (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs, hem and back of the neck. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short twisted metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, two back pockets and skinny legs.
Imitation leather sandals with a braided foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5 cm.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim made from a cotton blend with lightly worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems. Text print on the coin pocket and inside of the hems.
Twill waistcoat with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and front pockets. Lined.
Top in an airy, patterned viscose weave with short sleeves, buttons down the front and a gathered seam at the top.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered motif on the chest. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Suit waistcoat in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, front pockets and a welt chest pocket. Lined.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.

Stretch cotton twill cargo joggers in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Cap in cotton with a small embroidered text detail at one side and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
